title: Wout van Aert, Lotte Kopecky, Filippo Ganna and more stars align for European championships
content:
It's a star-studded line-up for this week's European Championships in the Netherlands as riders race for a last chance of glory in 2023.

Read the full article at Wout van Aert, Lotte Kopecky, Filippo Ganna and more stars align for European championships on Velo.
author: sadhbhoshea
